last_episode_to_air.name: It All Comes to This
last_episode_to_air.overview: Lady Rah has put a bounty on Jake's head, and the brothers must retrieve the Anastasia from its hiding place and run for their lives. Willow and Ava face a vengeful Alexi, and Cam finally avenges Malcolm's death.

name: Ice
overview: A diamond dealer navigates the culturally diverse and treacherous world of the diamond business.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Follow the Green family as they plunge into the underbelly of the Los Angeles diamond trade. After wild-card Freddy kills a prominent diamond dealer, his brother Jake must bail him out and save the family business from a crime lord of the Los Angeles Diamond trade. Jake must endure all of this while maneuvering amongst jewelry thugs, blood diamond deals, false certificates, the Feds, and Pieter Van De Bruin, a ruthless Afrikaner diamond merchant who now heads up an Antwerp-based diamond cartel.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: With both their finances and their reputations in tatters, Jake and Freddy must find a way to rebuild. With the help from Tessa Pryor, a smart, capable and gorgeous lawyer, and Jeff Reardon, a sober coach, Freddy is seemingly on a better path. The discovery of a magnificent rough may put the brothers back on top – or it may tear them apart forever. Meanwhile, the death of a loved one drives Lady Rah to wage war on a powerful diamond conglomerate – from the inside. Cam joins forces with his estranged son Malcolm Rose in order to navigate the dangerous underworld of blood diamonds. And Ava is determined to provide a better life for her daughter and herself – even if it means making a deal with the one person she swore she’d never ask for help… her own mother.

episodes.name: Hyenas
episodes.overview: A diamond dealer navigates the culturally diverse and treacherous world of the diamond business.

episodes.name: Run You Bastards Run
episodes.overview: In an attempt to get out from under Lady Rah, Jake plots a heist at the San Pedro docks with disastrous consequences.

episodes.name: The Line
episodes.overview: Lady Rah sends Jake and Freddy to get illegal diamonds certified and ready for sale, but things get complicated when Isaac gets involved.

episodes.name: Two Handkerchiefs
episodes.overview: Jake and Freddy smuggle Lady Rah's diamonds into Vancouver, but things don't go as planned. Cam and Isaac butt heads over the direction Green & Green is taking. New evidence comes to light in the Avi Kreshman case.

episodes.name: Tears of the Gods
episodes.overview: The Green family comes together for a funeral, which brings long simmering tensions to the surface. A mysterious diamond dealer with ties to Cam's past arrives in LA.

episodes.name: Facet
episodes.overview: While Cam and Pieter scheme to gain control of Green & Green, Ava takes a bigger role in the family business against Jake's wishes. In the wake of his father's death Freddy takes steps to get clean. Carlos hits a dead end in his investigation.

episodes.name: Clarity
episodes.overview: Freddy and Jake attend an underground diamond auction. Pieter and Cam meet with a Venezuelan diplomat about re-opening an abandoned mine. The U.S. Attorney's investigation into Pieter Van de Bruin causes problems in Ava's new relationship.

episodes.name: Side Trip
episodes.overview: Jake and Lady Rah form an uneasy alliance against Pieter. Freddy and Ava work together to gain access to a Russian diamond syndicate. Cam's relationship with Sarah takes a turn for the worst.

episodes.name: The Cut
episodes.overview: Jake and Cam are on opposite sides after Vincent's murder brings the conflict between Lady Rah and Pieter to head; and Freddy and Ava try to turn their fortunes around in Russia.

episodes.name: Stand off
episodes.overview: With Pieter holding Ava hostage, Jake and Freddy must come together to save her; the investigation into Pieter begins to close in on Green & Green; Cam strikes out on his own, making a deal with the cartel.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Follow the Green family as they plunge into the underbelly of the Los Angeles diamond trade. After wild-card Freddy kills a prominent diamond dealer, his brother Jake must bail him out and save the family business from a crime lord of the Los Angeles Diamond trade. Jake must endure all of this while maneuvering amongst jewelry thugs, blood diamond deals, false certificates, the Feds, and Pieter Van De Bruin, a ruthless Afrikaner diamond merchant who now heads up an Antwerp-based diamond cartel.

episodes.name: Game of Stones
episodes.overview: With the Green Family in shambles, Jake realizes that finding the Holocaust Diamond will put them back on top –but a fruitless search leaves a dangerous trip to Venezuela as the Green Brother’s only option.

episodes.name: Thicker Than Water
episodes.overview: Jake and Freddy attempt to steal diamonds from the Venezuelan mine that they no longer own - but when the Cartel learns of their subterfuge, they find themselves running for their lives.

episodes.name: Heart of Darkness
episodes.overview: On the run from the Cartel, Jake and Freddy are saved by one of the Venezuelan miners and his family - but when the Cartel learns where they are, Jake & Freddy's presence jeopardizes the entire family.

episodes.name: Blood Brothers
episodes.overview: When Freddy and Jake fail to find someone they can trust to cut their rough diamond, Freddy decides to cut the stone himself, and model it after the famed "Anastasia Diamond".

episodes.name: Rendezvous with Death
episodes.overview: While Freddy attempts to cut the Anastasia Diamond, Jake faces down the Chinese Triad in order to earn their buy in for a prestigious Diamond Expo in South Africa.

episodes.name: Strange Friends
episodes.overview: Freddy, high as a kite, struggles to cut the Anastasia diamond as Jake goes to Alexi for protection. Cam's hell-bent on revenge and Lady Rah offers to help Ava with an important client.

episodes.name: Two Ounces
episodes.overview: An armed robbery at Ava's house leads to a momentary truce between Jake, Ava and Cam. Freddy finishes the Anastasia diamond, and Jake goes to Tessa for help.

episodes.name: Dig Two Graves... At Least
episodes.overview: To get to South Africa in time for the diamond conference, Jake must find Freddy and get the "Anastasia appraised. Lady Rah proposes her plan to re-certify the world's most expensive diamonds, and Cam heads to London to confront Malcolm's mother.

episodes.name: Clouds
episodes.overview: With the diamond expo and recertification process underway in Cape Town, Jake and Freddy try to sell the Anastasia diamond. Lady Rah offers to help Ava and adds another name to her hit list when part of her plan goes awry.

episodes.name: It All Comes to This
episodes.overview: Lady Rah has put a bounty on Jake's head, and the brothers must retrieve the Anastasia from its hiding place and run for their lives. Willow and Ava face a vengeful Alexi, and Cam finally avenges Malcolm's death.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: With both their finances and their reputations in tatters, Jake and Freddy must find a way to rebuild. With the help from Tessa Pryor, a smart, capable and gorgeous lawyer, and Jeff Reardon, a sober coach, Freddy is seemingly on a better path. The discovery of a magnificent rough may put the brothers back on top – or it may tear them apart forever. Meanwhile, the death of a loved one drives Lady Rah to wage war on a powerful diamond conglomerate – from the inside. Cam joins forces with his estranged son Malcolm Rose in order to navigate the dangerous underworld of blood diamonds. And Ava is determined to provide a better life for her daughter and herself – even if it means making a deal with the one person she swore she’d never ask for help… her own mother.
